content:
Sure! Here is the revised 7-day meal plan that includes approximately 850 calories per meal:

Day 1 - March 14:
Meal 1: Scrambled eggs with sautéed spinach and tomato, served with a slice of whole wheat bread and a glass of cow milk. (~420 calories)
Meal 2: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potato and green salad with a homemade dressing of olive oil and lemon juice, topped with sliced avocado. (~430 calories)

Day 2 - March 15:
Meal 1: Greek yogurt bowl with sliced banana, granola, and honey, topped with chopped almonds and a glass of cow milk. (~420 calories)
Meal 2: Baked chicken breast with roasted asparagus and brown rice. (~430 calories)

Day 3 - March 16:
Meal 1: Mixed berry smoothie bowl with cow milk and chia seeds, topped with sliced almonds and shredded coconut. (~420 calories)
Meal 2: Chicken curry with mixed vegetables (carrots, beans, and peas) and brown rice. (~430 calories)

Day
